ratings.comment: Professor Alix-Garcia is a fantastic instructor! Her classes are well-structured with clear expectations for the work to be done. But she isn't just about grades. She genuinely cares about student learning. If you make a mistake, she provides constructive feedback that helps you improve. She's also open to questions and willing to offer extra help.

There was an incredible amount of reading for an econ class and not ALL of it is mandatory to do well. Her grading for exams was inconstant in my opinion and she was a tough grader on random assignments for seemingly no reason. Overall, she was very kind but has some room to improve as a professor. The class was very interesting in my opinion.

Great course! There is quite a bit of group work, so be prepared. Most of the group work can all be done in class though. The Prof has great control of the material. Be warned that she is not an easy grader. Explain yourself and be specific. With that being said, she does award partial credit. The passion from this professor is unmatched, loved!!

Professor Alix-Garcia is extremely passionate about what she does. She is always willing to help her students. However, her lectures are inconsistent. Sometimes, they are very repetitive of the readings or focus on simple concepts, other times they are more involved. Also, there was a lot of reading, especially for an economics course.

Great professor! Passionate about development economics, friendly to students and extremely helpful when you ask her about homework problems. Very easy class, you only have to complete a few assignments and quizzes, no exams. I learned a lot but didn't have to spend tons of time for this class. Really tries to get her students to learn.
Great teacher.  passionate about the course.  Go to lecture and you'll do well on the exam.  The homework is also relative and helpful.
Great Prof. No exam.  Go to class. She doesnt make you buy a text book.  Very interesting.  Knows her stuff better than any teacher.  Very interesting and worth taking.
